channel.title: Hans Baker's Blog
channel.description: Insights and ramblings of a Software Engineering professional who has worn many hats, but mainly wants to code.

item.title: Claude Code is Eroding my AI Skepticism
item.description: A realistic look at using Claude Code for real work on existing projects
item.author: contact@hansbaker.com (Hans Baker)

item.title: Writing Rust for Web is a Pleasure
item.description: Leptos makes writing fullstack web applications a pleasure - learn about how Leptos provides a developer experience on par with the TypeScript ecosystem when writing Rust for the web.
item.author: contact@hansbaker.com (Hans Baker)

item.title: Why I Stepped Down from Leadership
item.description: Reflections on my return to engineering. Discussing why I stepped down from a director-level leadership position to return to a more technical role.
item.author: contact@hansbaker.com (Hans Baker)

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World! This is my blog.
item.author: contact@hansbaker.com (Hans Baker)
